page.title: 01N.TONBRIDGE & HILDENBOROUGH
page.content: The area lies to the north of Tonbridge and comprises the northern outskirts of the town,as well as the neighbouring parish of Hildenborough. It is heavily residential,with many modern estates,private and council, but with much older housing too. Shops are few,and there are no factories. There are several schools (state primary,state secondary,and private preparatory and public schools.Playing fields in the area all belong to the schools).There are also several farms, giving the area a rural flavour.This land is mainly grassland,but there are many acres of crops and some uncultiv- ated woodland.Several public footpaths cross this land.Local bus services are good on main routes,and two local railway stations(40 minutes to London) are within easy reach of the area.
